ruhunu maha raja wanshaye uppaththi kathawa se salakena ‘pandu aba ‘ katha puwatha padaka kara ganimin jaksan anthani wisin nirmanaya karana lada dawantha sinama nirmanaya ‘aba’ agosthu 08 wanida sita wallawaththa sawoyi pa්ramukha ee.ee.pi. mandalaye sinama shalawala thiragatha weyi.ohu chitha්rapata adhyakshanaya sampa්raptha wuye ‘juliyat ge bhumikawa ‘ (1998) adhyakshanaya karamini.eda meda thura lankeya sinama ithihasaye wadima piriwayak dara nipada wu chitha්rapataya lesa wartha wana meya paya 2 kuth winadi 8 k pura diga hareyi.mehi aba hewath pandukabhaya kumaru lesa jaksan anthanige puth sajitha anuththara charitha nirupanaya karana athara, rawindra randeniya (pandula ba්rahmanaya) malini fonseka (bhadra kachchayana) sabitha perera (unmada chitha්ra) saumya liyanage (habara ) kanchana kodithuwakku (digha gamini ) dulani anuradha (gumbaka bhutha) shi්rayantha mendis (parumukaya) bimal jayakodi (chiththaraja) wasantha moragaha (kalawela) wasantha dukgannarala (wasala panikki) lushan bulathsinhala (abhaya ) kinsli los (thissa ) madhumadhawa arawinda (girikandashiwa) athulu nalu niliyo wishala pirisak ranganayen dayaka wethi.jastin belagamage saha rajindra jayasinhage nishpadanayak wana ‘aba’ sinhala sinamawe wira katha sampa්radayata aarambhayak genena nirmanayak lesa handinwe.indunil
